description: A pleasant hike to a rocky beach along the Lynn Canal.The trail ascends to Dewey Lakes and follows the lakeshore to the end, then ascending slightly and following the hill contour before descending somewhat steeply over a rock section to the pleasant beach site.Camping, and outhouse and picnic tables are available at the landing. There is also a creek outlet at the far end of the beach.
directions: Start from the Dewey Lakes trail head. To get there drive East on 2nd and park just before it cross the railway tracks. Follow along the path north next to the tracks watching for the starting signage.
title: Sturgills Landing
